item.title: Hadoop-Running a cluster-Configurate a cluster (Core, HDFS, MapReduce and YARN)
item.description: 3 Virtual machines were prepared already. JDK, Hadoop have installed and environmental variables have configurated on them. If I want to use HDFS, MapReduce and YARN, I need to configurate them appropriate.
